descriptionHtml:
This is my first time making anything using the creation kit so I\'m not sure how well it will work... Add mod into game make sure you have the spartacus file selected... heres where I\'m not sure how it will go sometimes he is in the bannered mare but if he is not there(which happens sometimes for some reason) just go to console command and type player.placeatme 1c000d62 and you can spawn him. while in the console command you can also click on him and type setnpcweight 50 which will make his face less grey... Let me know if there is anything that needs to be fixed

I also will be putting up a Spartacus save game for those who would rather play as Spartacus instead of having him as a follower 

mods you will need

Better males- Beautiful nudes and faces- New hairstyle-faces-youngerfacesmergedwithmenbygenox
high res face maps for men by genox- V1_1
Hairless and Dirtless Nude Males
Revealing Iron Armor-male- noAcer edition Iron 1_5_3
author: shlylvsq
